attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time for the Labour Party to stand down and allow the british public to choose another party to lead the united kingdom.

As Prime Minister, you have made things go from bad to worse. You and Tony Blair have failed the british public ever since the Year 2000 and it is now time for you to provide us with a General Election.

It is time for the country to have a new leader which will make Great Britain better than it is now.

Every time I go to the shop, I hear customers complain about how bad the labour party has made the UK. 

By signing this petition, we can together make the UK a better place to live on.

Should you refuse to call for a General Election, you should at least tell us the truth as to why you are not going to provide us with an election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
